resources.string: Please enter your details to login and begin contributing to contain the current outbreak.If you do not have an account then click on CREATE ACCOUNT and create a new account.
Enter Your Details To Create An Account
Almost there please enter your phone number and your name

Tap on START to enable services when you go in public spaces.This will allow the device to detect nearby devices. In the case where you contract COVID-19 you can help the health ministry to trace potential carriers and safely contain the outbreak.You can TAP on STOP as soon as you come back home.
Enter the phone number of the person whose interactions you want to trace.Please do not misuse this application , as legal action can be taken against you.
